page.title: 09WHY HONDA CHOSE SWINDON (2)
page.content:
{3.}The Austin Rover car body plant could supply panels direct to South Marston if full-scale car assembly goes ahead. {4.}The engineering skills of the Swindon workforce and the town's reputation for rapid industrial growth helped sway Honda's decision. {5.}Swindon has good motorway links with London, especially Heathrow Airport which can be reached in an hour via the M4 motorway.
A new four-way junction will be built on the A419 road to ease the flow of 70 heavy lorries using the site daily. Landscaping of the site is being carried out to minimise the environmental nuisance to local residents. Our area will be greatly affected: more jobs, more money, more traffic, less open countryside.
